item.title: Cobalt Strike: Red Team's Best Friend
item.description: Cobalt Strike is software for Adversary Simulations and Red Team Operations, and is the leading C2 framework in Red Team exercises conducted today. This guide will show you how to use it and will deomnstrate some of the many features it has.
